mapper.sql: REC_ID, ROBOT_ID, USER_CODE, START_TIME, FINISHED_TIME, ELAPSE_TIME, BILL_TYPE, BILL_DATE, COMPANY_CODE
mapper.update: update CTAS_ROBOT_LOG set ROBOT_ID = #{robotId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_CODE = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FINISHED_TIME = #{finishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ELAPSE_TIME = #{elapseTime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BILL_TYPE = #{billType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BILL_DATE = #{billDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMPANY_CODE = #{companyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where REC_ID = #{recId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
